message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it's a great deal for its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and am willing to pay $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
